data.name: Pink Lettuce
data.description: Popularly known as Millennial Pink Lettuce or also referred to as Radicchio del Veneto, this is a rosy-coloured chicory. The pink vegetable is not a new concept, as it grown for years primarily throughout Italian regions such as Verona & southern France. Our beautiful natural pink lettuce is grown locally with imported seedlings in our hi-tech , HEPA climate controlled indoor vertical farming facility at 1 Instana and is harvested fresh, with only a limited stock available daily. A millennial trendy item, this lettuce is sure to bring a level of excitement to the mundane vegetable world & food enthusiasts on Instagram. Its great for food wraps, addition into salads or as for colour contrast decoration.

data.name: Wasabi Roots
data.description: Wild cultivated wasabi roots from Japan
